"Hey, it's you.": "Working hard every day, I see. Thanks as always."
"It's not that big of a deal."
"You're the hard worker."
"No, I mean it. The actions of you three have been plenty important."
"Ah, but only after I keep having you three bail me out."

"I was just looking over
the activity logs for you three."
"This is something Manon organized."
"A detailed, organized, perfect report."
"Manon did that for us?"
"I should probably start writing reports too."
"Manon keeps us constantly informed like that."

"She also gives us her input,
which has been rather enlightening."
"She's always such a big help to us."

"Nah, just whenever you
feel like it is fine."

"Aina has also sent us numerous reports,
but she seems to spend a lot of time on them."

"Even the reports themselves are usually gathered
and organized by Ran and the other Operators."

"There's little work for me at all.
I just leisurely drink some tea and wait."

"On the outside, I have Bruder taking magnificent
command of our offensive against the DOLLS."

"He's been coordinating with Ran
and the other Operators quite a lot lately."
"... Well, we had a lot of trouble inthe past."
"And then there's you three."

"One day I won't be able to do
anything but sit in that chair. Hehehe."

"... But, there's no guarantee that
our situation will always be like this."

"It's possible that a single rupture could
cause it all to come crumbling down."

"My job is to come up with a second and third plan
to make sure none of that happens."
"As well as the plan to prevent any such ruptures to begin with."
"I intend to more than fulfill my role as leader of Central City, so be at ease regarding that."
"Well, I think Ran needs me for something, so I should probably go back to work."
"Oh, right."
"If you're ever in the area, come stop by and visit again."
"I'd like to hear how you've been doing."
"Do take care."
